headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Celebrate the Holiday Season with the GTA Online Festive Surprise
content:
The Festive Surprise brings cheer and chaos to GTA Online. Local businesses and properties are festooned with decorations, while weather forecasts call for a rare snowfall over Los Santos.

Meanwhile, beware of The Gooch looking to empty the pockets of unsuspecting players this holiday season. Successfully fight off an attack from The Gooch to earn a little GTA$ bonus.

Plus, keep an eye on the sky for standoffs atop Weazel Plaza and log in anytime to receive Festive Surprise Gifts.
